name: Arm & Hammer 33200-84104 Baking Soda, 16 oz (Pack of 24)
short_description: INDOOR USE: Clean spills or accidents on upholstery and carpet, remove marks from walls and painted furniture, add to your laundry to make liquid detergent work harder and much more!
OUTDOOR USE: Keep outdoor furniture, grills, garage floors, driveways and more looking fresh and clean

BATHROOM CLEANING: For safe, effective cleaning of bathroom tubs, tile and sinks - even shiny fiberglass and glossy tiles, sprinkle Arm & Hammer Baking Soda lightly on a clean damp sponge and scrub as usual. Rinse thoroughly and wipe dry
HELP IN THE KITCHEN: Use Arm & Hammer Baking Soda to Deodorize Garbage Cans and drains, Clean Dishwashers and microwaves, Polish Silver Flatware and more

WHITEN, CLEAN, DEODORIZE: Add ½ cup of Arm & Hammer Baking Soda to your laundry to make liquid detergent work harder for you. A better balance of PH in the wash gets clothes cleaner, fresher, brighter
product_description: Baking soda is 100 percent all-natural for an inexpensive and environmentally sensible alternative to harsh chemicals. Its multipurpose design can be used as a gentle cleaner, effective deodorizer or a leavening agent for baking. Simply sprinkle it in waste receptacles to activate its odor-neutralizing properties to eliminate common household odors. Baking soda is perfect for cleaning carpet spills, freshening upholstery, deodorizing drains and more.

product_description: Arm & Hammer Baking Soda Fresh & Natural Household Odor Eliminator is designed to absorb and eliminate big odors in small spaces effectively. This versatile odor eliminator is perfect for use in closets, bathrooms, refrigerators, and other confined areas where odors can accumulate. The spill-proof package ensures ease of use and prevents messes, making it a convenient solution for maintaining a fresh and clean environment in your home. Trusted for generations, Arm & Hammer Baking Soda is a natural and safe way to tackle household odors.

product_description: Sure, you know our little orange box. But did you know that for more than 165 years, people have chosen pure, versatile, effective, safe, and affordable Arm and Hammer baking soda for baking, household, and personal care uses? Our purity meets the most stringent requirements and conforms to pharmaceutical and food code standards around the world. Not every baking soda can make that claim. With countless applications, no other product does more throughout your home. Make your bathroom shine, degrease dishes, eliminate odors and remove grunge from grills. Our boxes are available in multiple sizes for any household need. Use this twelve pound container for everything from pampering your feet with a refreshing soak to cleaning baby toys without harsh chemical cleaners and of course baking.

product_description: Discover the endless possibilities and uses for ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda, the simple and versatile solution for a clean and fresh home. ARM & HAMMER is America’s #1 trusted Baking Soda brand. You know that pure Baking Soda is great for cooking and baking. Now, discover more than 100 ways to use Baking Soda, from cleaning your carpets to getting rid of pet odors, making laundry sparkle, creating inexpensive crafts for kids, and even enjoying a spa-worthy pedicure. When you need a quick and gentle cleaning solution to mop dirty kitchen floors, scrub bathroom countertops, and clean toys, furniture, and pots and pans, we've got tips to clean and refresh every room in your home. Each 1 lb box of pure Baking Soda is the perfect size for storing in your pantry, laundry room or bathroom. As a natural odor eliminator, cleaner, and deodorizer with so many uses, make pure ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda an essential in your home.

name: Bob's Red Mill Baking Soda, 16oz (Pack of 1) - Non GMO, Gluten Free, Vegan, Paleo Friendly, Kosher
short_description: Baking soda is bicarbonate of soda, a top-quality leavening agent also known as sodium bicarbonate or sodium hydrogen carbonate.
In addition to carbon dioxide gas and bubbles, baking soda also yields a chewy texture that is essential to many baked goods—think of your favorite chocolate chip cookies.
Make an all-purpose cleaning spray: Make a mixture of ½ teaspoon dish soap, 1 teaspoon baking soda and 2 Tablespoons white vinegar in a spray bottle. Fill with warm water, shake and spray.
Deodorize, soften and whiten laundry: Add ½ cup baking soda to a load of laundry to help eliminate odors and naturally soften.
product_description: Bob’s Red Mill Baking Powder is a must-have for home bakers looking for homemade perfection, every time. This double-acting baking powder releases carbon dioxide when mixed into dough and batter, then again when heated, helping baked goods rise to every occasion. It’s the ideal leavening agent for quick breads, biscuits, scones, muffins, cakes and more. Unlike some baking powders, this contains no added aluminum, so there’s no metallic aftertaste—just delicious flavor. Made with monocalcium phosphate and sodium acid pyrophosphate, it’s a superior alternative to traditional aluminum-based powders. Plus, it’s gluten free and produced in a dedicated facility to ensure it's safe for those with celiac or gluten sensitivity. Keep it stored in a cool, dry place and it’ll be ready whenever inspiration strikes. With Bob’s Red Mill Baking Powder, fluffy pancakes, tender muffins, and perfectly risen cakes are just a whisk away.
